column1: is it safe currently to visit mcleodganj, birbiling and nearby places because of the recent coronavirus epidemic.. we plan to visit the above places next week..please advise as i read a few articles stating that the above places are on high alert because of coronavirus
Just because there are Chinese looking Tibetan people in India (dharamshala), it doesn't mean they have visited China.
Hi, please advise latest update. Whether now it's a risk to visit dharamshala? As I am planning to visit in next couple of days.Edited: 4:00 am, March 05, 2020

Dear Guest,Dharamshala , Mcleodganj has none suspected cases for the virus.In total 3 cases have been suspected in the entire state but no confirmed case yet. Hence the situation is more panicy as foreigers and tibetans are here. The government has issued no travel advisory against the hill state or Mcleodganj. Hence, you are welcome to stay here.RegardsRana's House Mcleodganj

They sell chinese goods at very cheap prices how they get it nobody knows

According to The SP and DC kangra (Dharsmhala and Mcleodganj), You cannot not travel to Dharsmhala till 15 April. But Date will be extend as per the current situation.  And only one tibetan person died in Mcleodganj due to corona virus, who recent back from USA. So its good to be stay at home, for couple of days or month.
